alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 18 at 8:28PM CDT until April 22 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove affecting Leake County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Yockanookany River Near Ofahoma affecting Leake County. Pearl River At Jackson affecting Rankin and Hinds Counties. Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove. * WHEN...Until Friday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Monday the stage was 27.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain stead today. It will begin falling this evening and will fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 25 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Tuscolameta Creek Walnut Grove 25.0 27.0 Mon 8 pm CDT 27.0 25.9 24.6 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 1030 AM CDT.
